parameters.name: TableRowIndex
parameters.description: Index of the pattern instance in the pattern table (see Remarks )

parameters.name: ControlDimName
parameters.description: Name of the controlling dimension of the pattern instance (see Remarks )

parameters.name: NewValue
parameters.description: New value for the pattern dimension

title: IDimPatternFeatureData.SetInstanceDimensionValue
description: Sets a new value for the pattern dimension of the specified pattern instance in this variable pattern feature.
signature:
System.String SetInstanceDimensionValue( 
   System.Int32
TableRowIndex
,
   System.String
ControlDimName
,
   System.Double
NewValue
)

parameters.name: TableRowIndex
parameters.description: Index of the pattern instance in the pattern table (see Remarks )

parameters.name: ControlDimName
parameters.description: Name of the controlling dimension of the pattern instance (see Remarks )

parameters.name: NewValue
parameters.description: New value for the pattern dimension

returns: If a new value for the pattern dimension is... Then Return Value is an... Set Empty string indicating success Not set Error string
remarks:
Use:
IDimPatternFeatureData::GetTableRowIndex
to get TableRowIndex.
IDimPatternFeatureData::GetControllingDimensionName
to get ControlDimName.
